description: Call of Duty Black Ops 7 just enjoyed a beefy reveal at Gamescom Opening Night Live, where fans of the long-running series were able to see some of the returning and all-new features coming to the upcoming shooter. Alongside a mind-bending campaign, which will feature full four-player co-op for the first time since Black Ops 3, and returning staples like Zombies, this latest game also appears to be pulling out all the stops for its cast, which is currently packed with celebrity turns. Here's everyone we can make out from Black
title: Meet Call of Duty Black Ops 7's Star-Studded Cast
Supernatural Horror Film Bring Her Back Now Available On 4K Blu-Ray
Yakuza 0 Director's Cut For Switch 2 Gets Huge Discount At Amazon

description:
There Are No Ghosts at the Grand is a first-person, narrative-driven mystery game developed by Friday Sundae. This is the studio's debut game, and a hands-on demo is available for those at Gamescom this week. I watched the demo ahead of its release at a preview event, and the game is an alluring combination of part-ghost story, part-musical, and part-renovation game. The heart of the game is the ghost story, though, and the developer works to make this spooky seaside tale approachable for everyone.

In There Are No Ghosts at the Grand, you play as Chris David, a character who has inherited The Grand, a dilapidated hotel located along the English coast. Chris is initially only tasked with restoration of the hotel, but he is ultimately drawn into rooting out a deeper mystery that surrounds the town and the people who live there.
title: This Ghost Story Musical Is Packed With Personality And A Fright-Filled Mystery
Kirby Air Riders Is Cheaper Than Forgotten Land's Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

description:
Marvel Rivals Season 3 has already added Jean Grey aka Phoenix and Blade to the lineup, but The Abyss Awakens is far from over. Later this month, NetEase is debuting a new game mode and a new map that brings Season 3's enemy, Knull, to the forefront.

The new map is located on Klyntar, the planet of the Symbiotes, and it's called Throne of Knull. It's connected to the Venom Spire that runs through the core of the planet and features Knull himself still trapped in his throne. But perhaps not for long, as he absorbs Phoenix's flames in the first video of the map.
title: Marvel Rivals Season 3 Introduces Resource Rumble Mode And The Throne Of Knull Map

description:
After achieving breakout success with Black Myth: Wukong in 2024, developer Game Science is returning with a sequel, Black Myth: Zhong Kui. It's another single-player RPG, and you can watch the teaser below.

"This single-player action role-playing game draws its primary creative inspiration from the famed Chinese folk figure Zhong Kui," reads a line from the game's description.

The game is still in "early development," so there is no in-game footage available just yet. But you can take a look at the cinematic trailer below. There is no word yet on platforms or a release date.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: New Black Myth Game, Zhong Kui, Announced With Teaser Trailer

description:
Today, during Gamescom Opening Night Live, Capcom debuted a new trailer for Resident Evil Requiem, which gave a brief look at protagonist Grace Ashcroft's origin story--as well as a look at her mother, Alyssa Ashcroft, from Resident Evil Outbreak.

The trailer begins with Grace and Alyssa in a hotel room, where Grace receives a phone call; the man on the phone asks for her, then immediately hangs up. Suddenly, the lights of the entire hotel go out, and things spiral from there.

Resident Evil Requiem is set t
title: Resident Evil Requiem Trailer Explores The Backstory Of New Heroine Grace Ashcroft

description:
As part of Gamescom Opening Night Live, Wargaming announced World of Tanks: Heat, a new 10v10 hero shooter/tank combat hybrid game that looks to mix the best of Overwatch with the best of World of Tanks.

Players will be able to choose from a selection of tanks and "agents"--Heat's version of heroes from other similar shooters--and take on other players in classic multiplayer modes, with Kill Сonfirmed, Domination, and Conquest among the confirmed formats. Players will also be able to customize their tanks with "advanced weapons systems, armor modules, visual mods, and battlefield-altering abilities," according to the official announcement.
title: World Of Tanks: Heat Is A Hero Shooter Where The Heroes Have Customizable Tanks

description:
The fall release of Ghost of Yotei is quickly approaching, and Gamescom Opening Night Live included a new trailer, offering another glimpse of cinematics and gameplay from the new open-world samurai game from Sucker Punch Productions. While the footage itself didn't provide any new information, the end of the trailer confirmed that a huge feature from the game's predecessor, Ghost of Tsushima, will return.

Ghost of Yotei is getting its own multiplayer Legends mode, which will take the game's mechanics and combat into a supernatural setting for co-op multiplayer missions. Legends will be free DLC for anyone who purchases the base game, which releases October 2--but Legends won't launch until sometime in 2026.
title: Ghost Of Yotei Is Getting Free Multiplayer DLC Next Year

description:
World of Warcraft's Midnight expansion is coming early next year, and it's reimagining an often forgotten part of old Azeroth to look and feel brand new--the Blood Elf lands of Quel'thalas.

Blizzard threw back the veil on WoW's 11th expansion, the second in its three-expansion-long Worldsoul Saga trilogy, at Gamescom 2025. It revealed that two of the expansion's four new zones are actually old ones rebuilt from the ground up, with a reimagined Silvermoon City serving as the expansion's main hub. Blizzard also detailed other new features coming with Midnight, like a new opt-in open-world system called Prey, another playable Allied Race, a third Demon Hunter specialization, and the full arrival of player housing.
title: In World Of Warcraft: Midnight, What's Old Is New Again

description:
World of Warcraft's transmogrification system is finally getting a major facelift with its 2026 Midnight expansion, with one-time gold costs for outfits and the ability to automatically swap between looks based on certain situations.

As it is now, players in Blizzard's MMORPG use transmog to transform the appearance of individual items into different ones, allowing them to create and save different outfits. It costs varying amounts of gold each time an appearance is changed.

However, because the transmog is tied to the items themselves and not the item slot it goes in, getting a new piece of gear means having to frequently re-transmog gear. It's particularly noticeable at the beginning of an expansion or the start of a new season, when players are constantly getting new gear upgrades. Rather than spending the gold to transmog each item immediately, many players just wait, knowing they'll
title: WoW: Midnight Is Finally Making Transmog Much Cheaper And More Convenient

description:
Those who preorder World of Warcraft's upcoming Midnight expansion will get to start decorating their in-game homes early, but the entirety of the MMORPG's highly-anticipated housing system won't be arriving in full until Midnight launches next year.

In an interview with GameSpot prior to Midnight's full reveal as part of Gamescom Opening Night Live, WoW senior game director Ion Hazzikostas offered more details on when players can expect to get their hands on player housing, what the feature's early-access period will look like, and how things will work for those who don't preorder.
title: WoW Player Housing Will Launch With Patch 11.2.7, But Not In Full

description:
Cult of the Lamb is getting a large, paid expansion in 2026, with the debut trailer revealed at Gamescom ONL. Titled Woolhaven, this latest update to the Devolver-published hit looks to be adding an entirely new biome for you to cultivate more followers in.

The trailer captures what makes Cult of the Lamb so captivating, with a distinct mixture of gore and humor that translates over to its eye-catching 2D gameplay. The roguelite/management game looks to be introducing various new elements into the mix, with some new mounts, snowy environments, and gruesome bosses all showcased in the brief gameplay snippet.

🏔️INTRODUCING WOOLHAVEN 🏔️
Cult of the Lambs HUGE story expansion!
title: Cult Of The Lamb Is Getting Its Big Paid Expansion, Woolhaven, Early In 2026

description:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2's next expansion, Legacy of the Forge, now has a release date--and it's soon. The second story DLC for the popular RPG will launch on September 9.

This was announced at Gamescom Opening Night Live in Cologne, Germany alongside a trailer showing it off. "Put your blacksmithing skills to the test as you rebuild a burnt-down forge in the heart of Kuttenberg. Design and customise the workshop, its surroundings, and your private quarters--with upgrades that do more than just look good," reads a line from the expansion's description. Here's the trailer:
title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2's Second DLC Gets Trailer And Release Date

description:
Obsidian Entertainment has revealed details about the companions that can join you in The Outer Worlds 2, making sure to clarify that there won't be any romance, just like in the first game.

Revealed during Gamescom Opening Night Live, there are six total companions in The Outer Worlds 2, each coming from a different faction and sporting a different set of skills. Niles comes from the Earth Directorate, excels in engineering, and appears to have stealth abilities like invisibility. Valerie is a robot companion also from the Earth Directorate, armed with two turrets. Aza is from The Glorious Dawn, and takes the role of the bloodthirsty assassin.
title: Meet The Outer Worlds 2 Companions, Whom You Can't Romance

description:
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 will officially launch on October 21, co-publishers Paradox Interactive and White Wolf revealed during Gamescom Opening Night Live. In a new trailer, players also got a closer look at the game and how parts of the storyline will see them step into the shoes of Fabien--a mysterious Malkvian detective and the voice inside of the protagonist Phyre's mind--who'll help them unravel a murder mystery that threatens to alter Seattle's secret vampire society.

Alongside the standard release, there'll be two special editions that can be preordered. Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 Deluxe Edition comes bundled with Santa Monica Memories--a cosmetic pack featuring decor items inspired by the original Bloodlines game--to adorn Phyre's in-game apartment, and the Premium Edition includes that DLC and the DLC S
title: Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 Sinks Its Fangs Into An October Release Date

description:
During Gamescom Opening Night Live, 11 Bit Studios and Digital Sun confirmed that Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault--the half-roguelike, half-shop-running-sim follow-up to the 2018 action-RPG Moonlighter--will enter early access on October 23.

A new trailer for the game debuted during ONL, which gave an updated look into both halves of Moonlighter 2's main adventure. We see the hero merchant Will setting up relics in his shop to sell to the local townspeople, followed by him setting out into a mysterious Vault in search of more relics to fill his shelves.
title: Moonlighter 2 Releases In Early Access Soon, Including Game Pass On Day One

description:
Today, during Gamescom Opening Night Live, Jyamma Games announced its next souls-like action-RPG adventure: La Divina Commedia, a new take on Dante Aligheri's Divine Comedy. Despite how the early portion of the trailer may look, it's not to be confused with the Dante's Inferno game published by EA in 2010.

The debut trailer shows a warrior take on a skeletal beast in fast-paced combat, with multiple dodges and parries as the beast swings wildly at the swordsman. After defeating the ghoul, the warrior moves on to a massive lake, where a spectral gate looms on the horizon.
title: Somehow, This New Game Isn't A Dante's Inferno Sequel

description:
A new Silent Hill F trailer debuted as a part of Gamescom Opening Night Live and features the game's English cast for the first time. While exact narrative details remain cryptic, the trailer did give a concrete look at the game's combat and showed a mysterious figure wearing a fox mask.

This young man seems to be a central in the game. The trailer opens with him declaring that protagonist Hinako "saved my life and laid claim to my soul. In turn, I shall save your soul by claiming the life of your old self." What this means is up to interpretation. But the trailer does depict Hinako confronting what appears to be another version of herself.

Otherwise, although it shows new locations and details, this new look is similar to prior trailers, with Hinako wandering an abandoned village beset by horrific crea
title: New Silent Hill F Trailer Features Doppelgangers, Creepy Fights, And English Voice Cast

description:
During Gamescom Opening Night Live, Wargaming unveiled World of Tanks 2.0, a massive update to the 15-year-old free-to-play tank battle game, which will launch on September 3. The 2.0 patch is described as the "most ambitious update in World of Tanks history" and will add a highly-requested feature: Tier XI vehicles are finally coming to the game.

16 new Tier XI vehicles will be added to the game on the 2.0 patch's launch day, with each offering unique gameplay mechanics and a new progression system specific to Tier XI. More vehicles at this new top tier will be coming in the future, according to the official announcement.
title: World Of Tanks 2.0 Adds Tier XI Tanks, New PvE Campaign, And More Next Month

description:
The next entry in the Warhammer 40K series was announced at Gamescom Opening Night Live today, with Warhammer 40K: Dawn of War IV getting unveiled and set for a 2026 released on PC.

German developer King Art Games s producing Dawn of War IV, and it will be published by Deep Silver. The original Dawn of War games were made by Relic Entertainment. You can wishlist Dawn of War IV on Steam now. This is the first game in the series not made by Relic.

"Return to the RTS series' roots with deeply satisfying strategy gameplay. Take command of four unique Warhammer 40,000 factions, including the Adeptus M
title: Warhammer 40K: Dawn of War 4 Announced, Coming Next Year To PC

description:
Monster Hunter Wilds and Final Fantasy XIV are having a crossover event, with both games receiving new content based on the other.

Announced during Gamescom Opening Night Live, Monster Hunter Wilds X Final Fantasy 14 will bring new event content to both games. Monster Hunter Wilds will get a new monster called Omega Planetes, a four-legged machine boss from Final Fantasy XIV, along with FF14 cosmetics, like Chocobo mounts. This content will arrive as part of Title Update 3 in late September.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds X Final Fantasy 14 Collaboration Revealed For Both Games

description:
At Gamescom Opening Night Live, developer TT Games revealed its latest game, Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight. Following on from the studio's work with other properties, such as The Lord of the Rings and Star Wars, this latest installment promises to be the definitive Batman experience that celebrates the Dark Knight's storied history.

The reveal trailer featured numerous callbacks to popular moments from nearly two decades of Batman films, recreating memorable scenes with the Lego game's signature humor and visual style. There's an assortment of villains, too, from Joker, Penguin, Catwoman, and Bane (voiced by none other than Matt Berry, star of the TV series What We Do in the Shadows).
title: Lego Batman: Legacy Of The Dark Knight Looks Like The Arkham Game We've Been Waiting For

description:
Lords of the Fallen 2--technically the third game in the series--takes place one hundred years after the 2023 reboot. The previous game revolved around traveling between the world of the living and the world of the dead. In the sequel, the two dimensions are converging. The debut trailer was shown as a part of Gamescom Opening Night Live.

This story is developing.

Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025: All The Biggest Announcements, Games, And Trailers
title: Lords Of The Fallen 2, Third Game In Series, Revealed At Gamescom

description:
The anime adaptation of Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice has officially been revealed as Sekiro: No Defeat. Debuting at Gamescom Opening Night Live, From Software parent company Kadokawa--alongside anime streaming platform Crunchyroll and animation studios Qzil.la and Arch--spoke about how this production aims to respectfully adapt From Software's cult-classic game with fully hand-drawn animation.

Set in a fantastical reimagining of Sengoku-era Japan, Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice follows the Shinobi Wolf on his quest to rescue the young lord Kuro. The anime will be available exclusively through Crunchyroll outside of Japan, China, and Korea upon its debut later in 2026.
title: Sekiro Anime Officially Revealed, Watch The First Trailer Here

description:
As part of the big Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 reveal at Gamescom today, Activision announced more details on the game's multiplayer mode, including the reveal of a 20v20 mode.

It's called Skirmish, and it has players racing around not just to shoot each other but also to complete objectives. The Skirmish mode also features new abilities, including wingsuits and grappling hooks. Additionally, it has vehicles in what's described as a large-scale mode.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Adds A New 20v20 Mode With Wingsuits And Grappling Hooks

description:
Activision has revealed tons of new information about Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, but perhaps most importantly, it's confirmed a release date: November 14. Additionally, the publisher announced more details and live gameplay will be shared at the Call of Duty: Next event on September 30.

Call of Duty: Next has become Activision's annual event for showcasing live gameplay for each year's upcoming release. This live presentation usually includes tons of new details on features and talks with Call of Duty developers, as well as live gameplay featuring tons of Call of Duty content creators.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Release Date Set For November, CoD Next Coming In September

description:
Among the new features in Call of Duty: Black Ops 7's multiplayer mode is a way to easily share customized weapon builds with other players.

Customized loadouts are a huge part of Call of Duty, with the Gunsmith feature allowing for plenty of variety with attachments to create unique weapon builds. However, sharing these custom weapon builds with friends often felt tedious in previous games. Black Ops 7 aims to make sharing these Gunsmith creations much easier with two new methods for doing so.

Treyarch says players will have the option to send their weapon builds directly to others on the game in "just a matter of clicks."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: CoD: Black Ops 7 Aims To Make Sharing Weapon Builds Easier Than Ever

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 launches on November 14, bringing an all-new campaign set in 2035 with Milo Ventimiglia starring as David Mason. Treyarch has now confirmed that Black Ops 7 will feature progression across all modes. This means players can finally rank up and earn more meaningful rewards simply by playing through the game's story.

In the past, Call of Duty campaigns were separate from the other modes, and players couldn't earn XP or many rewards from story missions. Black Ops 7 aims to make all modes feel rewarding, and the campaign is now tied into the same progression system.
title: CoD: Black Ops 7 Will Let You Level Up And Earn Rewards In Its New Campaign Endgame

description:
For the first time in Call of Duty's history, we're getting back-to-back Black Ops titles, and whereas last year's Black Ops 6 was grounded in the '90s, Black Ops 7 aims to propel Call of Duty back to the future.

Unlike the far-future setting possibly hinted at in leaks, this is just the near future, as seen back in Black Ops 2. The game won't feature jet packs, wall-running, or anything too high-tech, but there are still plenty of gadgets, robots, and enhancements to Treyarch's omnimovement system to provide the futuristic aesthetics for Black Ops 7. The game will also launch with an ambitious new campaign and a massive round-based Zombies map.

GameSpot recently attended an early preview of Black Ops 7, where we received a huge info dump across all the game modes and previewed a few bits of the game. Despite being tasked with developing these back-to-back title
title: CoD: Black Ops Again? Black Ops 7 Does Plenty To Avoid Feeling Like DLC

description:
Ghostrunner studio One More Level revealed its next game, Valor Mortis, during Gamescom Opening Night Live. While the studio's previous Ghostrunner titles were set in a cyberpunk world that prioritized speed, agility, and precision swordplay, Valor Mortis offers a different experience with its blend of first-person souls-like action, metroidvania-inspired levels, and a more methodical approach to melee combat.

Set in a warped version of war-torn Eastern Europe during the Napoleonic Wars, players step into the boots of a resurrected French soldier who must master the corrupting power of a mysterious, plague-like Nephtoglobin substance to save humanity. The battlefield has become infested with terrifying creatures, and as the revived Grande Armée soldier known only as William, skill and horrifying new powers are the only things that'll keep
title: Ghostrunner Devs Reveal Next Game, A First-Person Souls-Like Set During The Napoleonic Wars

description:
If there's one thing we all love in fantasy games, it's wizards who are also animals. It's the one universal, very specific truth about gamers. So when the Gamescom Opening Night Live pre-show debuted a new trailer featuring a wizard who is also a frog, our hearts were all a-flutter. Oh and it also revealed the game is releasing on October 9, but focus, people.

In the story trailer we saw one of the outcasts, the recently revealed Cider, rescuing an adorable frog baby, before starting to get overwhelmed by imperial forces. Then the frog mage intervened, and boy, was he pissed that these armies are threatening a frog baby. Mess them up, frog man!

The trailer ended with the October release date, and included the key art update with the new playable character. That brings the total revealed roster so far up to four, and new characters keep getting added to the key art as they're revealed.
title: Absolum Looks Great In Release Date Trailer, But More Importantly There's A Frog Wizard

description:
Announced during Gamescom Opening Night Live, developer Undercoders is making a Tony Hawk-inspired game set in a futuristic and dystopian Japan that's titled Denshattack. However, instead of kick-flipping and rail-grinding on a skateboard, Denshattack has you pull off impressive tricks on a train.

"Creating the world of Denshattack has been a joy for the team," game director David Jaumandreu said in a press release. "Inspired by the art, culture, and music of Japan, and, of course, our love of trains and skateboarding, Denshattack is a project we've wanted to make for a long time, and we can't wait for the world to experience what we've been building."
title: Tony Hawk Meets Trains In This Kick-Flipping Dystopia, Coming To Xbox Game Pass In 2026

description:
Gamescom Opening Night Live is one of the biggest events on the gaming calendar, as Geoff Keighley's showcase of video games is an annual buffet of reveals, teasers, and new gameplay trailers. Currently underway at the Koelnmesse in Cologne, Germany, today's show looks like it'll be a big one, as we know that several upcoming games like Silent Hill F, Ninja Gaiden 4, and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will be featured. Those are just some of the games we know of, and we're also hoping to see a few surprises thrown into the mix.

As usual, we'll be keeping track of the entire event, and you can check back here regularly for updates on everything that's been shown.


Don't miss out on the Gamescom Opening Night Live Pre-Show


While Opening Night
title: Gamescom Opening Night Live 2025: All The Biggest Announcements, Games, And Trailers

description:
A multiplayer beta for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 has been leaked on the Xbox website, revealing the first chance to try out the newest entry in the blockbuster FPS series is coming up this October.

Here's everything you need to know about the upcoming Black Ops 7 multiplayer beta, but be aware we don't know all that much yet since the existence of the product page just emerged minutes ago.

When does the Black Ops 7 beta start?

The Black Ops 7 multiplayer beta starts on October 2, according to an Xbox.com product page for Black Ops 7. But October 2 is only when the "early access" period begins. Everyone else can start playing on October 5, according to the product page.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Beta: Start Date, How To Get In, And Everything Else To Know

description:
Earlier this summer, BioShock 4 reportedly failed an internal review, which led to Cloud Chamber head Kelley Gilmore exiting the studio. Now, Cloud Chamber has been hit with layoffs as a former Diablo boss steps in to take over the studio.

Bloomberg's Jason Schreier was the first to report about Cloud Chamber's layoffs. He also added that former Diablo boss Rod Fergusson will be the new studio head for Cloud Chamber. Fergusson previously took over production of BioShock Infinite and helped guide that game to completion. Fergusson recently announced his departure from Blizzard after spending five years with the company.

2K Games subsequently shared an inter
title: BioShock 4 Studio Laying Off Devs As Diablo Boss Takes Over

description:
Ark: Survival Evolved is one of the best survival games on the market, and over the past decade since its launch, the game has fostered a massive community of players. This community has taken it upon themselves to create thousands of mods for Ark, and some of these improve the game in ways that fans would have never expected. From adding entirely new maps to creating more dangerous and unique dinosaurs to making your life easier with quality-of-life changes, the best Ark mods can fundamentally alter how you play the game.

Down below, you’ll find the top mods that Ark has to offer. These are all searchable and downloadable via the game's Steam Workshop section. The modding community for Ark began on
title: Best Ark: Survival Evolved Mods To Download In 2025

description:
Updated on August 19: This story was originally published in May when the acoustic-only model was revealed. PlayStation Direct now has an acoustic-electric version.

Music is a major element of The Last of Us, both the video game and the HBO TV series based on it. In the newest season of th
title: The Last Of Us-Themed Taylor Acoustic-Electric Guitar Is Available Now For $3,000

description:
As it currently stands, playing Monster Hunter Wilds on PC can be a subpar experience. It's had plenty of issues since launch, and while it's better now for some, it still suffers from numerous performance problems. However, Capcom is continuously working on solving the game's issues on PC, and in a post shared to the official Monster Hunter X account, it explained the steps it intends to take, but it sounds like significant fixes may not arrive until this winter.

"To our hunters playing [Monster Hunter Wilds] on PC, we're committed to listening to your feedback and improving both performance and stability of the game," reads the post. "Although we will continue to implement gradual improvements in the weeks ahead, we are targeting Free Title Update Four this winter to implement a multifaceted plan, including CPU and GPU related opt
title: Monster Hunter Wilds PC Problems Will Be Addressed In An Update This Winter

description:
Sony's Inzone PC gaming collection is branching beyond headsets and monitors with its next batch of releases. Most notably, Sony is entering the gaming keyboard and mouse scene with competitive-focused options made in collaboration with esports team Fnatic. Like all products in the series so far, the Inzone KBD-H75 Wired Gaming Keyboard ($300) and the wireless Inzone Mouse-A ($150) are built with high-end components and carry premium prices.

Sony is also releasing a new flagship Inzone H9 II wireless gaming headset with ANC and audio drivers based on its new WH-1000XM6 headphones. Perhaps the most niche addition to the series is the Inzone E9, a pair of wired $150 earbuds. Preorders for all of the new Sony Inzone peripherals open today at Amazon, Best Buy, and Sony. Take a look at all of the upcoming gear below. But first, here's a quick breakdown of
title: Sony Unveils First Gaming Keyboard, Mouse, And More New PC Gear

description:
This year, games that were previously Xbox-exclusive properties have been migrating to PS5, including the upcoming Gears of War remaster, Gears of War Reloaded. Just under two decades ago, the original Gears of War was one of Xbox's signature titles. Now, the co-creator of the franchise, Cliff Bleszinski, has shared his thoughts about seeing Gears of War appear on a PlayStation console.

"It doesn't feel strange," said Bleszinski during an interview with Eurogamer. "I'm thrilled that more people are going to get to experience a big part of my legacy that I worked so hard on."

Bleszinski also noted that he's interested in returning to the series as a consultant, but "crickets" has been the res
title: Gears Of War Co-Creator Is "Thrilled" That The Franchise Isn't Xbox Exclusive Anymore

description:
Like previous months, the Xbox Game Pass library is being updated in August 2025 with new titles that'll be released in two waves. The first wave of games for the month included Assassin's Creed Mirage and 9 Kings, and Microsoft has confirmed what players can expect in the second wave of new arrivals.

The biggest game here is the day-one release of Gears of War: Reloaded, a remaster of the Xbox 360 cover-based shooter. This version of the game has been overhauled graphically, and it'll have 4K textures, revamped lighting and shadows, and 120 FPS in multiplayer modes.

Other releases to look forward to thi
title: New Xbox Game Pass Titles For August Include Gears Of War Remaster And Chaotic Goats

description:
Goodbye


As it does twice per month, Microsoft is removing more titles from the Xbox Game Pass library very soon.

There are five titles heading out of the catalog on August 31, including Borderlands 3 and Sea of Stars. Check out the full gallery to see all five titles getting dumped from the catalog later this month.

Microsoft cut three games from Game Pass in the middle of August, bringing the total number of removals for August to eight.

In terms of arrivals for Augus
title: Microsoft Is Dumping These Five Game Pass Titles Very Soon

description:
Folks, I think it's happening. Team Cherry, the renowned developer behind Hollow Knight and its upcoming sequel Silksong, is teasing a major announcement this week. All signs appear to point towards news of an imminent release date or even a shadowdrop.

Early on the morning of August 19, Team Cherry shared a post on social media--its first in a while, as a matter of fact--announcing that it would be making an announcement two days later. At the same time, it shared a link to a livestream on the team's own YouTube page dated to go live on August 21 at 7:30 AM PT/ 10:30 AM ET.
title: Hollow Knight Silksong Is Teasing A "Special Announcement" This Week

description:
It appears the price and release date for Activision's Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 have leaked ahead of an official announcement that could come as soon as today, August 19.

Reputable leaker billbil-kun said the game will launch on Friday, November 14, priced at $70 for the standard edition and $100 for the Vault edition. This pricing is not surprising, as Microsoft--which owns Call of Duty and publishes the games--had already said it would not charge $80 for any games this year. Still, it's notable because some people theorized that Microsoft would up the price, in part because the company originally announced pl
title: Even Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Won't Get Xbox To Price A Game At $80 - Report

description:
Helldivers 2 is officially crossing over with Halo: ODST, and it will add more than just some new armor sets.

As detailed by Xbox following several teases over the last week, the Helldivers 2 Halo: ODST Warbond will launch for PlayStation 5, PC, and Xbox Series X|S on the same day Helldivers 2 launches on Xbox, August 26. It will be the game's first "Legendary Warbond," Helldivers 2's battle-pass-like system through which players can spend medals earned by completing missions and orders to unlock a Warbond's content. Unlike a normal battle pass, Warbonds don't expire.

The Halo: ODST Legendary Warbond is loaded with more content than a typical Warbond:
title: Helldivers 2 ODST Crossover Will Add 4 Iconic Halo Weapons And More

description:
Apologies to fans of the series who have been playing it since the very first game, but next year, Resident Evil turns 30. The first game came out all the way back in 1996, on March 22 to be precise, with many games having been released in the meantime. There's obviously a new game releasing next year, Resident Evil Requiem, but it seems that aside from putting out a new entry, Capcom is also planning … something for the series' 30th anniversary. A new anniversary website is now available for you to peruse, only right now there's not much to look at.

At the top of the site is a beautiful piece of art showcasing the game's numerous protagonists, like Leon Kennedy, Claire and Chris Redfield, Jill Valentine, Ada Wong, and Resident Evil Requiem's main character Grace Ashcroft.

<
title: Capcom Gears Up For Resident Evil 30th-Anniversary Celebration With New Website

description:
DC games haven't had the best of times in recent years, marked by a string of missteps and canceled projects. While titles like the Batman: Arkham series found success, much of the broader DC gaming output has lacked consistency. This is something James Gunn wants to remedy as part of the 10-year plan as co-head of DC Studios.

When the rebooted DCU launched in 2023, Gunn emphasized cross-platform storytelling, noting that actors would portray their characters "across all forms of media--including video games." While there has been little public
title: James Gunn Aims To Reverse DC's Troubled Gaming Legacy With Long-Term Vision

description:
Pokemon Legends: Z-A is out in a couple of months, but as of right now there's plenty we don't know about the game. However, it seems that later this week we'll be learning … something new about the game. The uncertainty is due to a creepy post shared by the official Pokemon account, sharing that there's a YouTube premiere coming at 6 AM PT / 9 AM ET / 2 PM BST on August 21, this Thursday.

This post was paired with the caption, "Viewer discretion advised," alongside an emoji of a camcorder, and a first-person perspective of someone clinging to a locked fence at nighttime. Pokemon is no stranger to unsettling lore or even trailers, but if this wasn't on the official Pokemon X account, it would be a very believable teaser for a first-person horror game. We'll just have to wait until Thursday to find out ju
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Latest Teaser Might Make You Think It's Switched Genres

description:
Earlier this week, Nintendo revealed that Pokemon Legends Z-A is getting four-player battles when it launches later this year. But if you're looking for a throwback fighting-game experience, the fan-made Pokemon: Close Combat has an update of its own. Since its launch in 2023, Close Combat has gradually increased its roster of fighting-type Pokemon. And now, the latest fighter has been added to Pokemon: Close Combat with a reveal trailer.

Marshadow isn't just a fighter, but also a
title: Fan-Made Pokemon Fighting Game Adds Another Character

description:
Shinobi: Art of Vengeance is due out later this month, and now Sega has announced a fun if surprising bit of DLC that's coming "early 2026." Dubbed the Sega Villains Stage, details are still pretty light on the DLC, but Sonic the Hedgehog's Dr. Eggman is set to appear as a boss fight. Alongside that, protagonist Joe Musashi will have two other guest villains to take on, though they are yet to be revealed. If you're picking up the digital deluxe edition of Shinobi: Art of Vengeance, you'll automatically unlock it whenever the DLC does arrive next year.

Sega also announced that Young Dirty Bastard (YDB), i.e. the son of the late Ol' Dirty Bastard from Wu-Tang Clan, is releasing a song called The Path Has Just Begun inspired by the Shinobi series. It'll be released on streaming services this week, August 21, and you can expect a new trailer
title: Shinobi: Art Of Vengeance Is Getting Sega Guest DLC, Including Sonic's Eggman

description:
In November, the Xbox Series X|S console will have been around for five years. Naturally, there has been talk about the next generation of Xbox consoles, and Microsoft recently spoke about what it envisions for its future hardware and its idea of a player-first environment that will follow players across multiple devices.

Speaking on the Official Xbox Podcast, Next Generation at Xbox VP Jason Ronald explained how the company is looking to evolve the Xbox ecosystem across multiple devices in the future. "When we think about the future of the Xbox, we're really focused on how do we put the player at the center of the experience, and when you really look at how modern players play games today, the vast majority play across multiple different devices," Ronald said.
title: Next-Gen Xbox Console Aims To Put Players First, Says Microsoft

description:
A recently discovered Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 video showed what appeared to be a character flying through the air on a jetpack, with some theorizing this might be a new feature for the game. But according to reliable Call of Duty fan account Charlie Intel, that is not the case.

"Black Ops 7 does not have jet packs or double jumps as part of its movement," the account posted. The video in question showed "something specific" that will make sense once Black Ops 7 is unveiled in more detail today, August 19, during Gamescom, the account said.

Another reputable insider, TheGh
title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 7 Leaked Video Wasn't Pointing To Jetpacks, Apparently

description:
Facing mounting pressure from lawmakers and a newly filed lawsuit by the state of Louisiana, Roblox recently issued a lengthy statement addressing what it calls “erroneous claims and misconceptions.” But reports suggest the Louisiana lawsuit is just the tip of what will eventually be a very large legal iceberg, as the platform faces rampant allegations that it has failed to protect the young people who make up the majority of its playerbase.

Roblox is a wildly popular game creation platform that hosts user-made games like Dress to Impress (which recently launched a collaboration with pop icon Lady Gaga), Grow a Garden, and Brookhaven. It sees tens of millions of daily active users (reported numbers vary between 82 and 111 million), and almost 40% of its playerbase is children under the age of 13. As such, it has faced intense scrutiny amid several reports (including a massive one p
title: Roblox Responds To Louisiana Lawsuit And “Erroneous Claims” Of Child Endangerment Amid Mounting Pressure

description:
Nvidia has announced that its RTX Hair feature will be added to Indiana Jones and the Great Circle on September 4. In a nutshell, RTX Hair uses Disjoint Orthogonal Triangle Strips (DOTS) to improve lighting and shadows in video game hair, which Nvidia says is a solution that doesn't require a lot of extra memory as opposed to using triangles to render hair for every frame.

By using linear swept spheres, hair will look more realistic because the geometry is naturally round, thus making it easier to avoid self-intersection when casting shadow and reflection rays. This will allow Harrison Ford's digital doppelganger in the Indiana Jones game to sport a fuller head of hair when the update to the real-time path tracing mode arrives next month. The feature will be available to RTX-50 series GPUs, and earlier this year,
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle Gets Hair-Raising New Tech Next Month

description:
Aggro Crab has finally revealed the answer to a question we've all been asking about Peak, its surprise hit co-op climbing collab with Landfall--is Bing Bong sentient?

The answer is yes, or at least, he used to be. The studio revealed in a recent video that developers used to possess Bing Bong to talk to streamers, but no longer will be doing so. In a video that shows a look behind the curtain, Aggro Crab revealed that devs would talk to players through Bing Bong, but only in cases where they were publicly sharing their game.
title: Peak Developers Confirm They Were Talking To Players Through Bing Bong Plush

description:
Despite the legendary dragon Pokemon's popularity, a large number of Pokemon fans are going around pronouncing Rayquaza's name wrong--and The Pokemon Company is trying to teach us how it's actually said.

If you use the common pronunciation of ray-KWAH-zuh, you would be incorrect according to official sources. A reminder of this--and the correct pronunciation--was popped up on the big screen at the Pokemon World Championships 2025 over the weekend, IGN reports. According to the "mispronounced Pokemon" graphic shared by The Pokemon Company, the correct pronunciation is ray-KWAY-zuh, sounding closer to the word quasar.

Ray KWAY Zuh confir
title: The Pokemon Company Wants You To Pronounce Rayquaza Correctly

description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley's next free update arrives this week, and it's themed around Inside Out. The update, titled Emotional Rescue, includes a new realm replicating Inside Out's Headquarters, and introduces Joy and Sadness as new characters--along with plenty of new items and cosmetics.

When the free Emotional Rescue update drops on August 20, players will be able to access a new realm from the Dream Castle--the Headquarters from Inside Out. Players can complete various quests themed after the Disney Pixar film, and build a remote Headquarters to invite Joy and Sadness to their Valley. Both characters have tasks they need help with in exchange for cute themed Friendship rewards--Joy wants to fix the Valley's mood swings, while Sadness needs help with a rainy day.

The Memory Mania Mini-Event will be returning between September 1 and 16, where players will have to track down Riley's phone when it sp
title: New Disney Dreamlight Valley Update Welcomes Inside Out Characters

description:
Deadlock's cast of heroes will be expanding significantly over the next two weeks, with six new characters being introduced one-by-one. The new heroes coming to Valve's steampunk MOBA include a vampire, a doorman, a Frankenstein-style monster, and a goat.

The first new character, Mina the vampire, is live in game now, but the release schedule for the rest of the new heroes is yet to be decided--players will be able to vote on which character is released next, with a new hero dropping every other day in a rolling update reminiscent of Valve's TF2 days.

Mina is introduced as a glass cannon who can deliver quick bursts of Spirit damage from a distance. She can also turn into a swarm of bats to escape sticky situations, and her ult unleashes an even bigger swarm to hunt down and silence enemies.
title: Deadlock Is Getting Six New Heroes Over The Next Two Weeks

description:
Rainbow Six Siege is celebrating its tenth anniversary this year, and a new operator is coming to the game in September when Year 10: Season 3 begins with Operation High Stakes. The new guy is called Denari, and he's got the potential to be a game-changing defender thanks to his ability to lay down laser traps.

Denari is a Swiss military veteran who wields a Scorpion EVO 3 SMG or an FMG-9 SMG, and an optional P226 Mk 25 pistol in conjunction with his Glaive-12 shotgun sidearm. But the real attraction is his ability to use T.R.I.P. connectors to make laser grid traps that can slow do
title: This New Game-Changing Rainbow Six Siege X Defensive Operator Plants Laser Traps
